summary: Build a redesigned site with immersive animated background layers (floating symbols, particle effects, parallax, glowing haze) and glassmorphism-style glowing card panels for text sections.

existing_features.title: Create a reusable “glowing glass card panel” style (glass effect) that matches the requested card design: slight transparency, soft glowing border, rounded corners, and subtle shadow.

Apply the new glowing glass card panel style to text-focused sections and cards across the main site (at minimum: About section feature cards, News post cards, and the News “Create New Post” form), replacing any one-off card styling so these panels share the same glass/glow look.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add global animated background layers: floating clan symbols, particle effects, subtle parallax on scroll, and soft glowing haze.
Create glowing card panels for text sections with glass effect (slight transparency), soft glowing border, rounded corners, and subtle shadow.

projectName: Add glassmorphism glowing card panels for text sections
